author: Reuters Editorial
title: Italy's coronavirus lockdown measures to be extended to April 13: minister
description: Italy will extend anti-coronavirus lockdown restrictions imposed last month to April 13, Health Minister Roberto Speranza said on Wednesday.
content:
ROME (Reuters) - Italy will extend anti-coronavirus lockdown restrictions imposed last month to April 13, Health Minister Roberto Speranza said on Wednesday. 
“We must not confuse the first positive signals with an ‘all clear’ signal. Data shows that we are … [+617 chars]
